EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - New Tricentis Professional Program - 2014.11.21.Email - Last Call
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Thursday: New Tricentis Professional Training Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: New Tricentis Professional Training Program – Available Jan 2015
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Last chance to join our webinar and learn more about the new changes to the Tricentis Professional Training Program, rolling out in January 2015. Tricentis head of training, Xaver Benz, will be introducing the new changes to our training program and how easily it will be to re-certify your current Tricentis certificates.
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar!
Pre-registration for the new Professional Training Program is currently available. Please contact the training team here <mailto:training@tricentis.com>. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-new-tricentis-professional-program-2011.11.21.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-new-tricentis-professional-program-2011.11.21.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Thu Nov 27, 2014 12:30 p.m. – 1:30 p.m. CET 6:30 a.m. – 7:30 a.m. EST
Xaver Benz Head of Tricentis Training Tricentis
